[[inst_hl_casb]]
==== HL.CASB

*Syntax:* hl.casb<.{aq, rl, f, aqrl, aqf, rlf, aqrlf}> [SrcL], SrcR, SrcD, ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Compare and Swap: atomic 8-bit compare-and-swap operation.

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_casb.svg[HL.CASB encoding,width=800]

*Group:* AMO/CAS
